summary: The script serves as a practical example for training and persisting a Text2SparqlModel using NVIDIA NeMo. It outlines the required TSV data format, details configurable sections (trainer, model, experiment manager, Hydra), and guides users through dataset conversion, configuration adjustments, and command‑line execution to produce a trained model checkpoint.
business_intent: Enable developers and data scientists to quickly set up and train a neural model that converts natural language questions into SPARQL queries, supporting applications such as semantic search, knowledge‑graph querying, and conversational AI over structured data.
